author: SPIKE77@aol.com
subject: Re: quick review of 'Return of Pycal' (minor spoilers)
body:
No. It doesnt show any history regarding Fujiko's past.

Hey Luis, if you can understand Japanese, can you explain what the story is 
about?




(SPOILERS CONTAINED BELOW)













Obviously, Lupin and Pycal are after crystals that have some sort of musical 
note information contained within. It seems that the musical configuration 
could cause destructive sound waves? How does that guy with the harp figure 
into it?

Steve
